title: Champion Portrait Recall Markers(In-Game Idea).
body: I think it would be quite nice if in game where it shows the Allied champion portrait's(either on the left side of the screen or just above the mini-map) to have a blue circle spinning marker around there circle portraits to indicate when there recalling. It would be nice considering it could even make up for some peoples horrible map awareness and would be a nice addition to the appeal of in-game. Please consider this Rito's will much appreciate to see this in any upcoming update's :^D.

replies.body: Also have their portrait flash when they lose more then 10% health so you know they are fighting
That would be really helpful too considering people don't notice nearby jungler's fighting so would also be quite a good addition.

I concur.

Also, give options to toggle on/off the notification such as posting "player_name (champion_name) is recalling to base" or something like that into chat would be great too.
